document_data.mainbody:
Yantra was an inhabitant of the Dalelands in the mid-14 century DR.
She took comments on cooking personally.
She thought highly of her husband, Pardus.
Yantra and her husband were patrons at the Highmoon Inn in  while Shandril Shessair was away, after Mirtul but before Flamerule. She had a brief argument with other patrons and ordered roasted boar for her man, though he wanted roasted deer.
